name: benchmark-tester
description: Benchmark test runner with package loading and result printing functions.

scripts.coveralls: npm run cover && cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.web:build: npm run web:build-src && npm run web:build-test
scripts.web:build-src: browserify src/tester.js --standalone BenchmarkTester -o web/benchmark-tester.js -u lodash -u platform && cd web && uglifyjs benchmark-tester.js --compress --mangle -o benchmark-tester.min.js --source-map url="'benchmark-tester.min.js.map'"
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run cover && npm run web:build

author: Takayuki Sato
